{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Butterfly watching {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Butterfly watching Butterfly watching is a hobby concerned with the observation and study of butterflies. It also includes the "catch and release" of butterflies. There are clubs, handbooks, checklists, and festivals devoted to the activity. The Canada Day and Fourth of July annual butterfly count, a census of species by butterfly watchers throughout North America, is an example of citizen science. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Butterfly watching)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
